definition: to compete/to take part in a competition
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: The panel of judges looked through more than 43, 000 entries to this year's competition.
sentences.chinese: 今年评委小组审阅了43000多幅参赛作品。

sentences.english: Participant(s) who fail to produce valid identity documents will not be permitted to participate in the race.
sentences.chinese: 未能出示有效身份证明文件的参赛者，不得出赛。

sentences.english: The downhill course measured 200m and competitors reached speeds of up to 25km per hour, the organizer said.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 组织者说，参赛选手的最高时速达到了25公里。

sentences.english: Participants must not discuss the problems with others before the deadline for solution submission.
sentences.chinese: 参赛者在截止日期之前不能和其他人讨论赛题。

sentences.english: The Contestant must be a resident of the District of Greater Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 参赛者必须于大温地区居住。

sentences.english: Sunday's marathon was the eighth for the 27-year-old, who has been running for more than a dozen years.
sentences.chinese: 上周日的马拉松比赛是这位27岁的女性第八次参赛。

sentences.english: Two copies of each entry should be submitted.
sentences.chinese: 每件参赛作品需提交两套作品予主办机构。

sentences.english: Since he started trials at the age of one, he never lost one.
sentences.chinese: 从它一岁开始参赛起，它就没有输过一场比赛。

sentences.english: Contestants mesmerised by their own singing.
sentences.chinese: 参赛者陶醉在自己的歌声中。

sentences.english: Or call into one PDSA's shops to pick up an entry form.
sentences.chinese: 当然你也可以电话生病动物之家来索取参赛表格。

sentences.english: The horse was running at odds of ten to one .
sentences.chinese: 那匹马参赛赔率是十比一。

sentences.english: Trophies for top 3 teams in each category of the Eco Adventure category.
sentences.chinese: 参赛号码亦会用作最佳环保衣著奖等其他奖项所用。

sentences.english: The Unemployment Olympians are laughing, but they are not okay.
sentences.chinese: 这些失业的参赛者们在笑，但他们并不真正的开心。

sentences.english: The Referee and Judges of a kumite bout must not have the nationality of either of the participants.
sentences.chinese: 对打回合赛的主审和副审或与参赛者不可有相同国籍。

sentences.english: The filly has been raced twice this season.
sentences.chinese: 这匹小母马本季度曾两次参赛。

sentences.english: I am a student, which entry form should I use?
sentences.chinese: 我是名学生，应填写哪份参赛申请表呢？

definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
to compete/to take part (in a sports event)
(sports) semifinal or quarterfinal/to compete in a semifinal (or a quarterfinal)
preliminary contest/initial heats of a competition
